ComicInfo.Title: Robot Within Robot; Cracked Interview with the Gangster King!; Jailbreak to Pool Hall; Celebrities Pump Iron!; Rockey: 2001; Bad Professionals!; Mr. Rockey's Neighb'hood; Ye Hang Ups; Cracked Look at Godzilla; Read 'em & Rate 'em!; Sylvester's Photo Album; TV & Movie Cover Ups!!; Sylvester P. Smythe's Cracked Pleasure Dome; A Fish Story; Arnold Fluffernutter Commandope
ComicInfo.Summary:
A robot attacks another robot with a peace sign. The second robot opens his chest, revealing another robot inside who fires a laser beam to destroy the first robot.
Hudd and Dini escape prison into a pool hall but the guard is there and knocks them out with billiard balls.
Godzilla turns out to be a skyscraper-sized suit played by dozens of people.
Charlie sacrifices himself to be processed as canned tuna.
